record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1894. Fourth row, left to right: Franklyn Cole Sherman, Philip Rand, Victor Washington Sincere, Adam Martin Wyant, S. D. Barnes, L. Wolff, Cecil V. Bachelle, and J. E. Raycroft (coach); third row: Louis Sass and Earle Williams Peabody; second row: Harry Victor Church, A. E. Davis, Harry Cyrus Holloway (captain), Gilbert Ames Bliss, and A. T. Pienkowsky; first row: Addison Alvord Ewing, John Lemay, W. B. Keene, and Edwin Frank Mandel.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
